definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: Inning of tidal flats is an important approach to keep the amount of field acreage on an appropriate level.
sentences.chinese: 灘塗圍墾是沿海地區耕地佔補平衡的重要手段。

sentences.english: Gulf reclamation project has an impact on the trends and siltation .
sentences.chinese: 海灣內的圍墾工程對潮流及衝淤都將產生影響。
